mapper.select: SELECT i.item_no, i.item_name, i.item_price, t.idx, t.item_idx, t.save_name FROM items i, tb_attach t WHERE i.item_no = t.item_idx ORDER BY i.item_name DESC
SELECT i.item_no, i.item_name, i.item_price, t.idx, t.item_idx, t.save_name FROM items i, tb_attach t WHERE i.item_no = t.item_idx ORDER BY i.item_name
SELECT i.item_no, i.item_name, i.item_price, t.idx, t.item_idx, t.save_name, i.item_view_cnt FROM items i, tb_attach t WHERE i.item_no = t.item_idx ORDER BY i.item_view_cnt DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT i.item_category_name, i.item_no, i.item_name, i.item_price, t.idx, t.item_idx, t.save_name FROM items i, tb_attach t WHERE i.item_no = t.item_idx AND i.item_category_name = #{itemCategoryName} ORDER BY i.item_name
SELECT i.item_no, i.item_name, i.item_price, t.idx, t.item_idx, t.save_name FROM items i, tb_attach t WHERE i.item_no = t.item_idx ORDER BY i.item_name

SELECT i.item_no, i.item_name, i.item_price, i.item_sale_price, i.item_content, i.item_category_name, i.item_stock, i.item_view_cnt, t.save_name, t.idx, t.original_name FROM items i, tb_attach t WHERE item_no = #{itemNo} AND i.item_no = t.item_idx
mapper.update: UPDATE items SET item_view_cnt = item_view_cnt + 1 WHERE item_no = #{itemNo}
